name: Santiago Poli
content: I was joking when I tweeted this. Now I see this and I think @seobotai will be my main acquisition channel for some of my business. I'm "farming" businesses with SEO. Planning to launch as soon as it starts receiving leads.

name: John Rush
content: @shreya_gr Since April using @seobotai Going pretty well for most projects, but not all, some niches are so competitive

name: Dev Hunt
content: DevHunt SEO traffic is growing every week too. Kudos to @seobotai and all seo ninjas out there.

name: Felix Gerschau
content: I've been using @seobotai for a few months now and it's been great. The articles are well-written and the internal linking is on point.

name: Sarah Chen
content: Just hit 10k monthly visitors thanks to @seobotai. The AI-generated content is getting better every week. Highly recommend!

name: Mike Anderson
content: SEObot has saved me hundreds of hours. The automated keyword research and content planning is incredible. Worth every penny.
